marklogic.body:
Whose expectations? Most of the team perform as I expect them: Gerrard, good; Bellamy, usually excellent; Suarez: hot and Cold; Kuyt, hard working.
But the rest of 'em? Adam? Carroll? I Always expected them not to work out and they have met my expectations too. I was disappointed the Â£50 Million we gave you for Torres wasn't better spent.
Well, it's good that somone at LFC is taking responsibility, although I would have expected this statement from Kenny first, Stevie second.
